attributes.action: do all he can to counter the - at times vicious and often unfounded - media propaganda against asylum seekers and immigrants; and inform British people of the sort of circumstances that lead people not born here to come here
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Very many people in this country seem to be virulently opposed to asylum seekers and immigrants; to such an extent that they don't seem to consider them as fellow members of the human race!  They're people, just like us, who had the misfortune - which was totally out of their control - to be born into human-rights-abusing (or impoverished) countries; what would these virulently anti-asylum-seeker people do if THEY had been born in such a country? just stay there for the only life they'll ever have?  If they wouldn't why should they expect asylum-seekers/immigrants to?
